name: backendhelsinkiunicert
description: back end on Node.JS with express

scripts.build:ui: rd /s /q build && cd ../fullstackopen/part2/phonebook && npm run build --prod && move build ../backendHelsinkiUniCert
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy
